name: Chocolate Protein Pancakes
stepByStepGuide: In a bowl, mix together the flour, protein powder, baking powder, and salt. /p In a separate bowl, whisk together the egg, milk, and melted butter. /p Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix until combined. /p Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat. Grease the pan with butter or cooking spray. /p Pour Â¼ cup of the batter onto the pan. Cook for 2-3 minutes until the edges start to brown. Flip and cook for another 1-2 minutes. /p Repeat with the remaining batter. /pServe the pancakes with your favorite toppings. Enjoy!
